text: Bolesław Kwiatkowski (28 July 1942 – 13 February 2021) was a Polish basketball player. He competed in the men's tournament at the 1968 Summer Olympics. He was born in Warsaw. Kwiatkowski died on 13 February 2021 in Warsaw, aged 78.Zmarł Bolesław Kwiatkowski.
